abstract: Slowly, even a bit gently, Eliot Spitzer’s successor as the attorney general of New York, Andrew M. Cuomo, is shaking up the financial industry.
snippet: Slowly, even a bit gently, Eliot Spitzer’s successor as the attorney general of New York, Andrew M. Cuomo, is shaking up the financial industry.
lead_paragraph: No one is dusting off those valiant titles once bestowed on Eliot Spitzer, honorifics like “The Enforcer” and “Sheriff of Wall Street.” But slowly, even a bit gently, Mr. Spitzer’s successor as the attorney general of New York, Andrew M. Cuomo, is shaking up the financial industry.

headline.main: Post-Spitzer, a New Breed of Reformer
headline.print_headline: Post-Spitzer, A New Breed Of Refomer
